base_description: Tall, rectangular, white cabinet with two compartments.
part_description: Includes one large lower door and one smaller upper drawer, both rectangular and aligned vertically. The door is larger and positioned below the drawer, both with handles.
internal_interaction_description: The upper drawer slides horizontally in and out, providing access to its storage space. The lower door swings open on hinges, revealing a larger storage area. Both parts are designed to open and close smoothly, utilizing space efficiently within the cabinet structure.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed in kitchens or bathrooms, providing storage for utensils, toiletries, or other items. It interacts with users through the opening of the drawer and door, allowing for easy access and organization. It can be positioned alongside other furniture or appliances, integrating into various room designs.
